about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a fullstack developer from a small village near Dęblin (They have a pretty good IT technical school and an aviation school there). I love writing clean code and learning new, useful technologies for my stack. I specialize in React, .NET, and MongoDB. Currently, I'm working on a shopping center management system and building personal projects, such as a tenant turnover analytics platform (a project for my engineering thesis). In my free time, I explore cloud services and play around with Linux (Oracle Cloud), DevOps, and system automation. Most of the time, when my friends need a server—for example, for Minecraft—I'm the one who sets it up for them.

experiences.title: Fullstack C# + React Developer
experiences.description: Developing a system for handling shopping centers using MongoDB, MUI, and a modern frontend/backend stack. Maintaining and implementing new features, ensuring code quality and data integration.

experiences.title: Support
experiences.description: Email customer service, solving problems related to the production system, close communication with the team. Tools: Office Suite, Azure DevOps, Teams, Slack, FreshDesk.

experiences.title: Programmer - Intern
experiences.description: Fullstack Angular + C# .NET, and MSSQL developer. Responsible for creating internal tools for client/team needs.

experiences.title: Professional Practice
experiences.description: Internship under the supervision of a programmer, creating first desktop applications in Windows Forms (C#). Learned basics of programming, interfaces, and application logic.
